title: Archbishop Sample - Why Go To Mass: Blood Of The New Covenant
description:
Archbishop Alexander K. Sample - Why Go To Mass: The Blood Of The New Covenant [audio presentation]

If you ever feel bored at Mass or think that you don't get much out of it, this talk is for you. Most Reverend Alexander K. Sample, Archbishop of Portland, provides theological and practical reasons why we need to come to a deeper understanding of the nature of the Mass. By understanding the Mass as a sacrifice and a sacred banquet, we can tap into the transforming power offered whenever we worship.
